user_instruction: 'Send Sarah an update on our current project status. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Current Project Status Update

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send me a brief update on where we stand with the investment-strategy presentation? Feel free to pull any relevant details from your Gmail or our shared Notion workspace.

Thanks a lot for your help!

Best,  
Sarah

final_output:
